caption.title: Model adequacy results for single-lag univariate models.
caption.p: Summary statistics for a model including monthly and yearly random effects and (a) SPI-6 and (b) Tmin at individual lags of 0 to 5 months: posterior mean, 95% CIs, the CV mean logarithmic score, the DIC, and the likelihood ratio R LR 2 statistic. CI, credible interval; CV, cross-validated; DIC, deviance information criterion; SPI-6, 6-month Standardised Precipitation Index; Tmin, minimum temperature.
Click here for additional data file.
